author: joe
msg: Upgrade to neon 0.18.5, to pick up fixes for Win32 build and
workaround for neon <0.18.4 Content-Type header parsing bugs.

author: gstein
msg: A big whack on the APR location and usage.
* apr.m4: clean out some hacks. Don't rely on APR_FIND_APR setting any
variables beyond apr_found and apr_config. Use apr-config to provide
us with all the necessary flags and switches. Fix up the "download"
* find_apr.m4: clear everything out. Just use apr-config for locating
APR and pass that back to the caller. They can use it to locate any
and all build information that they may need.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/subversion.spec : Ack! Phht! Typo! That's what I get for not

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/subversion.spec : Add repository write access limiting and
optional SSL password protection to the example repository configuration.

author: dws
msg: * packages/subversion.spec : Track changes to configuration.  Now requires the
APR and APR-UTIL exported from the apache-2.0.31-0.3 RPM package.
